stimulusHtml:
Cartoon by permission of The David Low Trustees and The London Evening Standards.

 

The cartoon above by the British caricaturist David Low was published
choicesHtml: just after the seizure of power by the Nazis in Germany in 1933
at the outset of the Spanish Civil War in 1936
in the wake of the 1939 nonaggression pact between Germany and Russia
after the defeat of France in 1940 by the German invaders
in response to the German invasion of Russia in 1941
